Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) represent the most efficient devices for producing electrical power from fuels.
Titulo: Tailoring the Cathode-Electrolyte Interface with Nanoparticles for Boosting the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Performance of Chemically Stable Proton-Conducting Electrolytes

Sentencas: The limit in their application is due to the high operation temperature of conventional SOFC materials.
Titulo: Tailoring the Cathode-Electrolyte Interface with Nanoparticles for Boosting the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Performance of Chemically Stable Proton-Conducting Electrolytes

Sentencas: Progress is made toward lower operating temperatures using alternative oxygen-ion conducting electrolytes, but problems of stability and electronic conductivity still remain.
Titulo: Tailoring the Cathode-Electrolyte Interface with Nanoparticles for Boosting the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Performance of Chemically Stable Proton-Conducting Electrolytes

Sentencas: A promising alternative is the use of chemically stable proton-conducting Y-doped BaZrO3 (BZY) electrolytes, but their practical applications are limited by the BZY's relatively low performance.
Titulo: Tailoring the Cathode-Electrolyte Interface with Nanoparticles for Boosting the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Performance of Chemically Stable Proton-Conducting Electrolytes

Sentencas: Herein, it is reported that deposition by impregnation of cathode nanoparticles on BZY backbones provides a powerful strategy to improve the BZY-based SOFC performance below 600 degrees C, allowing an outstanding power output for this chemically stable electrolyte.
Titulo: Tailoring the Cathode-Electrolyte Interface with Nanoparticles for Boosting the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Performance of Chemically Stable Proton-Conducting Electrolytes

Sentencas: Moreover, it is demonstrated that keeping the nanostructure is more important than keeping the desired chemical composition.
Titulo: Tailoring the Cathode-Electrolyte Interface with Nanoparticles for Boosting the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Performance of Chemically Stable Proton-Conducting Electrolytes

Sentencas: The proposed scalable processing method can make BZY a competitive electrolyte for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Tailoring the Cathode-Electrolyte Interface with Nanoparticles for Boosting the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Performance of Chemically Stable Proton-Conducting Electrolytes
